title: If Dogs Feel Jealousy, It May Run Deeper In Us Than We'd Thought
teaser: Dr. Christine Harris co-authored a study that examined whether dogs exhibit jealous behavior, hoping to see if jealousy is an emotion unique to humans. Audie Cornish asks Harris: Does it take complex cognitions to trigger the emotion?
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
